card.quote: The big money is not in the buying and selling, but in the waiting.
card.author: Charlie Munger

card.quote: Over many generations, fortunes in the business world were made through buying and selling products in physical stores. Internet fortunes have been made buying and selling products online.
card.author: Marc Ostrofsky

card.quote: Business is not financial science, it's about trading. buying and selling. It's about creating a product or service so good that people will pay for it.
card.author: Anita Roddick

card.quote: The best investment on Earth is earth.
card.author: Louis Glickman

card.quote: If you think you are too small to be effective, you have never been in bed with a mosquito.
card.author: Betty Reese
